Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Linezolid
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with linezolid for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive organisms
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci, including linezolid susceptibility for Enterococcus faecium (vancomycin-resistant) and Staphylococcus aureus (methicillin-susceptible and resistant).
